name: MeowByrinth
description:
Hi!
This game is the product of the Ludum Dare #43 where the theme was Sacrifices must be made, made using the Unity engine.

In this game you play as a small cat who wants to join its best friends in heaven. In order to do that it will need to find its way into a maze full of traps and overcome many danger using its powerful items. Unfortunately, God only allows passage to those who sacrificed enough. You will need to find him again and again until he is satisfied, each time with one less item at your disposal.

Controls are : -  WASD to move (or arrows but its a bit complicated)
                                - SPACE to dash
                                - Left click to use sword
                                - Right click to use arrows

As said before, this game was made during a gamejam, so don't expect a full game (there is only one level). Anyway we hope you enjoy it !

The team :

- Adrien Ronté : https://twitter.com/Disc0rde

- Axel Déret : https://www.linkedin.com/in/axel-d%C3%A9ret-047931a8/
